The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the helmet. It costs 64,818,916 for both the items required to make the dragon full helm (g).

The dragon full helm (g) is a dragon full helm with a dragon full helm ornament kit attached to it, and is part of Dragon gold-trimmed armour. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the helmet. It costs 64,818,916 for both the items required to make the dragon full helm (g).

While the helmet is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable full helm and ornament kit.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+45+48+41-1+46
 Other bonusesSlot

The '''dragon full helm (g)''' is a [[dragon full helm]] with a [[dragon full helm ornament kit]] attached to it, and is part of [[Dragon gold-trimmed armour]]. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the helmet. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Dragon full helm}}+{{GEP|Dragon full helm ornament kit}}}} for both the items required to make the dragon full helm (g).

While the helmet is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable full helm and ornament kit.
